title: Wild Game
description:
Five years ago, in a moment of hubris, I ruined my life.I made my choices, and I live with the curse that haunts me. I’ve found purpose in ensuring no other Keres makes my mistakes, and I was prepared to go through the rest of my days in lonely silence.Until her.Grace came into my town, into my life, and changed everything. As hard as I try to stay away, to keep my curse from touching her, it doesn’t matter.The gods are watching Grace. They’re not going to let her go unscathed.
Wild Game is the third book in the State of Grace series. It is a slow burn reverse harem (MMFMM) romance suitable for readers 18+.


State of Grace reading order:

 
   Run Riot 
   Silver Bullet 
   Wild Game 
   Dare Not 
   Saving Grace
author: Colette Rhodes
